CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 6, 1957, pg. 1, reads: "Bethel's Last Service - Mingled joy and sadness permeated the services at Bethel on June 30, when Bishop E. C. Hatcher joined Rev. C. S. Spivey Jr. in administering holy communion to the congregation. Left to right: Mmes. Mabel Garland, Sally Gilbert, the Rev. Mr. Spivey Jr., Bishop Hatcher, Mmes. Charles Jones, C. S. Spivey Sr. and Agatha Fields.  This was the final service in this historic edifice on the site on Elm St. A new church home will be erected on the lots at Morgan St. and Webster Ave. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mabel Garland, Sally Gilbert, Rev. C. S. Spivey Jr., Bishop E. C. Hatcher, Charles Jones, Mrs. Spivey Sr., and Agatha Fields, posed in Bethel AME Church
